20101230215417.000|20101230215420.000|TR0|cigarettes.  And so, basically, what he's 
20101230215420.000|20101230215422.000|TR0|saying is that the city, New York City, 
20101230215422.000|20101230215424.000|TR0|overstepped their bounds and was in 
20101230215424.000|20101230215426.000|TR0|violation of that federal statute.
